name: PLUNDER (itch)
description:
Do You want to be robber, steal and plunder everything what you see?  So just take a while, sit down and make your life better!  Take on a group of bandits who unfortunately can't take too many things at once. This game has lots of fun and can make you smile (that's my destiny).

Controls are soooo easy. Click left mouse button to set new destination, escape to return to menu, and hmm no, nothing more.

Game was created for Ludum Dare 42 Combo, using Unity + VS Code for mechanics and Slate Pixel + paint.net for graphics.
